name: 3D Survive - Shooter game
description:
3D Survive - Shooter game --> Is First Person Shooter which included...

 - 3D game

 - 14 different scenes

 - 8 different terrains

 - 10 levels

 - Automatic save game after level is completed

 - 5 different weapons with animations

 - Ammos for different weapons and first aid kits

 - About 10 different opponents (including 3 - different Bosses with animations)

 - Whole game included sounds of enemies and weapons.

 You must have a good strategy to complete all these levels...

Keyboard : W, S, A, D - Moving

E - Pick up weapons

R - Reload weapons 

Mouse : Up,  Down, Left, Right 

Left mouse button - Shooting

Escape - Quit

A lot of secrets and surprises in game... So a lot of enjoying...
